title: [BUG] No Taliyah worked ground (after using Q Ability) in Spectator Mode (Seen Game 1 S04 - PSG)

embed.description: No worked ground when talijah grabs the blue buff - Clipped by CinarioDE

body:
Hello community,

I was wondering if its on purpose that you cant see the worked ground after Taliyah used her q ability in the spectator mode.

I've already written a tweet to riot support and they answered that I should report it in this forum as a bug!

Maybe u can help me with this 

Greetings

Cinario

replies.body: Hi! This was originally removed because it got wicked busy in spectator mode, but we're re-accessing it. :)
